title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1810.3 - Eligibility for State financial assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1810.3 - Eligibility for State financial assistance

State Regulations
A State capital grant contract will be issued to provide
for an increase in the amount thereof otherwise payable with respect to an
urban renewal project up to but not in excess of one-half of the moving expense
payments made, out of local funds, for the actual moving expenses of displacees
which exceeds the limits provided in federal law or regulation but is otherwise
eligible thereunder and is not reimbursable, provided the federal grant
contract is entered into after May 2, 1967, and provides for the sharing of the
actual moving expenses of commercial displacees, in excess of $25,000 within
the limits allowed by law and these regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1810.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
